title: Pop done coaching Spurs; Johnson takes over
description: Gregg Popovich is moving to a full-time role in the Spurs' front office, and Mitch Johnson will take over head coaching duties, the team announced Friday.
author: Shams Charania

title: Hammon lauds Popovich, 'super happy' in WNBA
description: After hearing the news that Gregg Popovich would no long coach the Spurs on Friday, Aces coach Becky Hammon lauded "Pop" as a mentor while not ruling out a future move to the NBA.
author: Adam Rittenberg

title: 'I've shown I can still play here' - is De Bruyne leaving too soon?
description: Manchester City midfielder Kevin de Bruyne scored the winner against Wolves and is bidding an emotional farewell after 11 trophy-laden years at the club - but is he leaving to soon?

title: Rookie Antonelli, 18, youngest to take F1 pole
description: Andrea Kimi Antonelli takes his first Formula 1 pole position for the sprint race at the Miami Grand Prix.

title: Piastri tops Miami practice as Bearman crash creates Sprint Qualifying mystery
description: Oscar Piastri topped the sole practice session at the Miami Grand Prix as Oliver Bearman's crash prevented much of the field from completing their preparations for Sprint Qualifying later on Friday.

title: Draper dazzles in Madrid to reach final against Ruud
description: Jack Draper is one win away from claiming a second Masters 1000 title in two months after reaching the final of the Madrid Open.

title: Chiefs still stand alone atop PFF's AFC West power ranking after 2025 NFL draft
description: The experts at PFF have the Kansas City Chiefs as their top team in the AFC West after the 2025 NFL draft, according to a recent power ranking.

title: Golden State Warriors jersey history - No. 11 - Josh Grant (1993-94)
description: During his time suiting up for the Warriors, Grant wore only jersey No. 11 and put up 3.0 points and 1.7 rebounds per game.
